```{r}
#Thêm thư viện
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(car)
library(stringr)
```

```{r}
#Đọc file
All_GPUs<-read.csv("All_GPUs.csv")
```

```{r}
#Đồng bộ giá trị khuyết thành NA
All_GPUs <- All_GPUs %>% 
  replace(., . == "", NA) %>%
  replace(., . == "\n- ", NA) %>%
  replace(., . == "None ", NA)
missing_data <- data.frame(
  Column = colnames(All_GPUs),
  Percentage_Missing = sapply(All_GPUs, function(x) sum(is.na(x)) / nrow(All_GPUs) * 100)
)
print(missing_data)
```

```{r}
#Tạo frame
selected_column <- c(
  "Manufacturer",
  "Memory_Bandwidth"
)
new_GPUs <- All_GPUs[, c(selected_column)]
print(new_GPUs)
summary(new_GPUs)
```

```{r}
#Xử lý Memory_Bandwidth
new_GPUs$Memory_Bandwidth <- ifelse(
  is.na(new_GPUs$Memory_Bandwidth),
  NA,
  ifelse(
    str_detect(new_GPUs$Memory_Bandwidth, "MB/sec"),
    as.numeric(gsub("MB/sec", "", new_GPUs$Memory_Bandwidth)) / 1024,
    as.numeric(gsub("GB/sec", "", new_GPUs$Memory_Bandwidth))
  )
)
```

```{r}
#Chuyển đổi thành dạng số trừ cột Manufacturer
for (c in colnames(new_GPUs)) {
  if (c == "Manufacturer") next
  new_GPUs[[c]] <- ifelse(
    is.na(new_GPUs[[c]]),
    NA,
    as.numeric(gsub("[^0-9.]", "", new_GPUs[[c]]))
  )
}
#Thay thế các giá trị NA thành giá trị trung vị của cột đó
for (c in colnames(new_GPUs)) {
  ifelse(
    missing_data$Percentage_Missing[missing_data$Column == c] < 3,
    new_GPUs <- new_GPUs[!is.na(new_GPUs[[c]]), ],
    new_GPUs[[c]] <- ifelse(
      is.na(new_GPUs[[c]]),
      median(new_GPUs[[c]], na.rm = TRUE),
      new_GPUs[[c]]
    )
  )
}
print(new_GPUs)
summary(new_GPUs)
```
```{r}
table(new_GPUs$Manufacturer)
```
```{r}
# 4 Phan tich phuong sai
# gia dinh 1
AMD_data_1 <- subset(new_GPUs, new_GPUs$Manufacturer == "AMD")
qqnorm(AMD_data_1$Memory_Bandwidth)
qqline(AMD_data_1$Memory_Bandwidth)
shapiro.test(AMD_data_1$Memory_Bandwidth)

ATI_data_1 <- subset(new_GPUs, new_GPUs$Manufacturer == "ATI")
qqnorm(ATI_data_1$Memory_Bandwidth)
qqline(ATI_data_1$Memory_Bandwidth)
shapiro.test(ATI_data_1$Memory_Bandwidth)

Intel_data_1 <- subset(new_GPUs, new_GPUs$Manufacturer == "Intel")
qqnorm(Intel_data_1$Memory_Bandwidth)
qqline(Intel_data_1$Memory_Bandwidth)
shapiro.test(Intel_data_1$Memory_Bandwidth)

Nvidia_data_1 <- subset(new_GPUs, new_GPUs$Manufacturer == "Nvidia")
qqnorm(Nvidia_data_1$Memory_Bandwidth)
qqline(Nvidia_data_1$Memory_Bandwidth)
shapiro.test(Nvidia_data_1$Memory_Bandwidth)

leveneTest(new_GPUs$Memory_Bandwidth ~ as.factor(new_GPUs$Manufacturer), new_GPUs)
```

```{r}
#anova 1 bien
anova_model_1_Variable <- aov(new_GPUs$Memory_Bandwidth~new_GPUs$Manufacturer,new_GPUs)
summary(anova_model_1_Variable)
```

```{r}
#  Phan tich sau anova 1 bien
TukeyHSD(anova_model_1_Variable)
plot(TukeyHSD(anova_model_1_Variable))
```
